Package utilities

package utilities
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BaseAreaComparator
    Comparator class used to compare shapes base areas in the array
    BubbleSort
    The BubbleSort class provides static methods to sort a Shape object array using the bubble sort algorithm.
    GnomeSort
    Get gnomed Gnome sort (originally known as stupid sort) is a sorting algorithm that functions similarly to insertion sort, its difference being is that it doesn't use nested loops.
    HeapSort
    Heap sort is a sorting algorithm where the array is turned into a heap and then rearranged and the node on the heap is deleted from the heap so it can be sorted, in this sort, the smallest is put as the first found so it can be put at the end of the current position of the array
    InsertionSort
    The InsertionSort class provides static methods to sort a Shape object array using the insertion sort algorithm.
    MergeSort
    Sorts the specified array of Shape objects in descending order, according to the natural ordering of its elements.
    QuickSort
    Quick sort divides the array by creating a pivot variable to partition the array into 2 sub arrays, which then compares 2 objects and uses swap to rearrange the objects in descending order, and then recursively applies the process to both arrays and continues until only a single object remains as the final element in each partition.
    SelectionSort
    Selection sort takes the largest element in the array and swaps it with the first element.
    VolumeComparator
    Comparator class to compare volumes between shapes in the array.
